level.heading: Limitation on the use of adhesive stickers in the enforcement of alternate side of the street parking rules.
level.text: ยง 19-163.2 Limitation on the use of adhesive stickers in the enforcement of alternate side of the street parking rules. Neither the department nor the department of sanitation shall affix an adhesive sticker to any motor vehicle solely in connection with the enforcement of alternate side of the street parking rules.
